column1: The Pit Room////We arrived at 11am and there was a very small line but I know that will not last long with this place it's bound to be packed very soon. We ordered a three meat plate (double brisket/pork jalape√±o cheddar sausage) with three other meats a la carte (pulled pork
column3: and beef sausage) along with the beans and the mac and cheese. Let's dive into the meats first...
